## Setup

```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)

comparison <- read.csv("inst/extdata/comparison.csv") %>% 
  tibble::add_column(CumDist.x = NA, .after = Distance.x) %>% 
  tibble::add_column(CumDist.y = NA, .after = Distance.y) %>% 
  tibble::add_column(CumRateFlag = NA, .after = RateFlag) %>% 
  tibble::add_column(CumCourseFlag = NA, .after = CourseFlag) %>% 
  tibble::add_column(CumDistFlag = NA, .after = DistanceFlag) %>% 
  tibble::add_column(CumTotalFlags = NA, .after = TotalFlags) %>% 
  dplyr::mutate(DateTime = as.POSIXct(DateTime, format="%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S"),
                CumDist.x = cumsum(Distance.x))
  

head(comparison)
```

## Distribution of Flags

```{r}
ggplot(comparison, aes(x=DateTime, y=))
```
